full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 CEN ERVILLE MEDICAL GR JP R.D. NO. I FREDERICKTOWN, PENNSYLVANIA 15333 PHONE 757-6801 September 14, 1972 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that B.J. Wadhwani, M.D. is associated with the Centerville Medical Group earning $38,710 per year and has been with the group since October 12, 1970. Very truly yours, annil ? Rexted Daniel E. Lester, M.D. Medical Director DEL:md
